newsitem.title: UK: Freighter runs aground in strong winds at Veracruz.
newsitem.headline: Freighter runs aground in strong winds at Veracruz.

text.p: The Cyprus-flagged freighter Nika II ran aground in gale force nine winds at Veracruz anchorage, Mexico, Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service said on Tuesday.
The 15,251 dwt vessel was awaiting berthing instructions when strong winds caused it to drift and run aground.
A diver inspection will be carried out on February 18.
The Nika II sailed from Abidjan on January 23 and was inbound to Veracruz to load a cargo of bagged sugar for Algeria.
